title: Pachamala Poovu Lyrics Kizhakku Vasal
stanzas:
<div>
Pachamala Poovu Song Lyrics Kizhakku Vasal

pachamala poovu
nee uchchi mala thaenu
kutham kurai yedhu
nee nandhavana thaeru(2)

azhage ponnumani
sirichaa velli mani
kiliye kannurangau
thoori thoori hoi

pachamala poovu
nee uchchi mala thaenu
kutham kurai yedhu
nee nandhavana thaeru

kaathodu malar aada
kaar kuzhal aada
kaathoram lolaakku
sangathi paada (2)

manjalo dhegam
konja varum megam
anjugam thoonga
kondu varum raagam

nilava vaan nilava
naan pudichu vaaren
kuliye poonguyile
paatteduthu thaaren hoi

pachama poovu
nee uchchi mala thaenu
kutham kurai yedhu
nee nandhavana thaeru

azhage ponnumani
sirichaa velli mani
kiliye kannurangau
thoori thoori hoi

pachama poovu
nee uchchi mala thaenu
kutham kurai yedhu
nee nandhavana thaeru

poonaathu mugam paathu
vennilaa naana.
thaazhaamal thadam paarthu
vandha vazhi poga.

siththirathu sola
muththumani maala
moththathula thaaren
thukkam enna maane

vannamaa vaanavillil
nooledthu vaaren
vinnula meen pudichu
sela thaichi thaaren hoi

pachama poovu
nee uchchi mala thaenu
kutham kurai yedhu
nee nandhavana thaeru

azhage ponnumani
sirichaa velli mani
kiliye kannurangau
thoori thoori hoi

pachama poovu
nee uchchi mala thaenu
kutham kurai yedhu
nee nandhavana thaeru
